## But first, what is Quarto? {.smaller}

Quarto let's you use your favorite languages to create versatile, beautiful, and reproducible outputs. 

<center>

![](https://cdn.myportfolio.com/45214904-6a61-4e23-98d6-b140f8654a40/c2ef45f1-4a68-4c7a-a43f-bdcf0f90e104.png?h=57404b88e9bf43eea2d2b57c71b13303){#fig-image fig-align="center" width="50%"}

::: {.citation style="font-size: 16px"}
"Artwork from "Hello, Quarto" keynote by Julia Lowndes and Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel, presented at RStudio Conference 2022. Illustrated by [Allison Horst](https://allisonhorst.com/cetinkaya-rundel-lowndes-quarto-keynote)
:::

</center>

## How does Quarto work?  {.smaller}

Quarto gives you options for the actual tool being used to render your project into a plethora of output types. 

<center>

![](https://cdn.myportfolio.com/45214904-6a61-4e23-98d6-b140f8654a40/b5217f2a-f129-4bf9-90dc-c5b9783d0ea8.png?h=f8d3ed40353f4ae6eb77dae39072510c){#fig-image fig-align="center" width="50%"}

- [Quarto the definitive guide](https://quarto-tdg.org/presentations)
